weekly_top_story.headline: Large-scale post-marketing study shows oral antivirals reduce risk of long COVID by 14%
weekly_top_story.summary: New clinical data from the ANCHOR study demonstrated that oral antiviral treatment for COVID-19 significantly lowers the incidence of post-COVID conditions (long COVID) by 14%, suggesting a preventative benefit against long-term complications.

stories.headline: CMS launches landmark $50 billion Rural Health Transformation Program
stories.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services opened the application window for a $50 billion program aimed at transforming rural health care delivery, with the goal of improving access and quality in underserved rural communities.
stories.source: U.S. Department of Health & Human Services

stories.headline: Omada Health presents real-world evidence showing enhanced outcomes for GLP-1 users at ObesityWeek 2025
stories.summary: Omada Health revealed data demonstrating that engagement with their behavior change programs enhances the effectiveness of GLP-1 therapies for weight management, optimizing clinical outcomes and reducing wasted costs for patients and payers.

stories.headline: Philips 2025 U.S. Future Health Index highlights AI’s transformative potential in healthcare
stories.summary: The 2025 U.S. Future Health Index report finds that healthcare leaders view artificial intelligence as a key solution to systemwide challenges including staff shortages and patient access delays, emphasizing trust as essential for AI adoption to enhance care and reduce clinician burnout.
